property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is 1 plus the number of story cards in the victory display. β: –1. If you are at Tindalos, you automatically fail. γ: –2 (–4 instead if a Scientist asset is at your location). δ: –3. If you fail, deal 1 damage or 1 horror to an Ally asset at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is 2 plus the number of story cards in the victory display. β: –2. If you are at Tindalos, you automatically fail. γ: –3 (–6 instead if a Scientist asset is at your location). δ: –4. If you fail, deal 1 damage or 1 horror to an Ally asset at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When a Scientist asset would be defeated: It is abducted instead (set it aside, out of play).

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Anomalies in Spacetime story card is in play: Place 1p1e horror on a River Docks location, as anomalies. Then, add 1 anomaly to each location with an anomaly. _____ If the Mob Troubles story card is in play: Flip it over. Shuffle all 3 set-aside Sheldon Gang enemies into the encounter deck. If the Present Tick-Tock Club is in play, spawn the set-aside Old Sadie Sheldon enemy at it. _____ If the Unspeakable Abomination story card is in play: Flip it over. Spawn the set-aside Tyr'thraha enemy at Tindalos. _____ If the A Bitter Rivalry story card is in play: Flip it over. If you are playing the past era, spawn the set-aside Edwin Bennet enemy at the lead investigator's location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When a Scientist asset would be defeated: It is abducted instead (set it aside, out of play).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each remaining investigator in all eras is defeated and suffers 1 mental trauma. If the Edwin Bennet asset is in play in any era, proceed to (–>R2). If the Edwin Bennet enemy is in play in any era, proceed to (–>R3). Otherwise, proceed to (–>R4).

property.name: Text
property.value: Abilities on Scientist assets can be triggered by any investigator at that asset's location. ι When you move to a location, if one or more Scientist assets are at your location: Move any number of them with you Objective – Restore the timeline by completing the objective on each story card. If Tomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski are at non-Tindalos locations in all 3 eras, and each era has no story cards in play, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tindalos is connected to each Portal location, and vice versa. θ If it is your turn: Move to a Portal location. η: Test ή (2) or ί (2). If you succeed, rescue an abducted Scientist asset and put it into play at Tindalos, exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tindalos is connected to each Portal location, and vice versa. θ: Place 1 of your clues on Tindalos, or take control of 1 clue on a Tindalos location in any era. η: Test ή (3) or ί (3). If you succeed, rescue an abducted Scientist asset and put it into play at Tindalos, exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Place the Nikola Tesla asset at the Past River Docks. Flip this story card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you, Thomas Corrigan, and Mary Zielinski are all at the Past Miskatonic University: Anounce "Thomas and Mary have met." η If Thomas Corrigan, Mary Zielinski, and Nikola Tesla are all at the same location, spend 2p1e clues, as a group: Announce "Thomas and Mary are inspired by Nikola Tesla." θ If you are at the Past Miskatonic University, spend 2p1e resources: Announce "funding for an observatory has begin." Objective – If all 3 abilities on this story card have been triggered, add it to the victory display (place a resource token over each ability when it is triggered). Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test any skill (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool). θ Remove 1 newspaper from this location: Place 1p1e clues (from the token pool) on this location. Look at the top 5 cards of the encounter deck, add 1 to the victory display, and put the rest on the top and/or bottom of that deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Remove 1 time from this location: Remove 1 doom from an agenda in any era. If Thomas Corrigan is at this location, you may exhaust him to place 1 resource (from the token pool) on the Present Tick-Tock Club, as time. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 2 resources or exhaust a Scientist asset at this location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on a Present or Future River Docks, as a shipment. (Limit once per turn.)

property.name: Text
property.value: ηη Remove 1 seed from this location: Annouce "a tree seed has been planted." Gain 1 resource for each Scientist asset at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If "Thomas and Mary have met" and Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski are at this location: Announce "Thomas and Mary have married." ηη If "Corrigan Industries has been founded:" Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on Corrigan Industries, as a time capsule. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When you initiate a skill test, exhaust Thomas Corrigan: If you succeed, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Exhaust Mary Zielinski: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Nikola Tesla: Parley. Test έ (1). If you succeed, either gain 1 clue (from the token pool), draw 2 cards, or gain 3 resources. (Max once per game per option.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Place the Ezra Graves asset at the Present Arkham Advertiser. Flip this story card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you are at the Present Miskatonic University and "funding for an observatory has begun: Anounce "the observatory is built." η If "the observatory is built," "Thomas and Mary are inspired by Nikola Tesla," and Thomas Corrigan, Mary Zielinski, and Ezra Graves are at the Present Miskatonic University, spend 2p1e clues, as a group (4p1e clues, as a group, instead if you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode): Announce "teleporation research has begun." θ If "Thomas and Mary have met" and Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski are at Ye Olde Magick Shoppe, spend 1p1e resources: Announce "Corrigan Industries has been founded" and put the set-aside Corrigan Industries location into play in the future era. Objective – If all 3 abilities on this story card have been triggered, add it to the victory display (place a resource token over each ability when it is triggered). Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Spend 1 resource: Ready a Scientist asset at this location. (Limit once per round.) η Remove 1 newspaper from this location: Place 1p1e clues (from the token pool) on this location. Take 4 additional actions this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Remove 1 time from this location: Remove 1 doom from an agenda in any era. If Thomas Corrigan is at this location, you may exhaust him to place 1 resource (from the token pool on the Future Tick-Tock Club, as time. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Remove 1 shipment from this location: Gain 4 resources or 1 clue (from the token pool). η Spend 3 resources or exhaust 2 Scientist assets at this location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on the Future River Docks, as a shipment.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If "a tree seed has been planted:" Gain 1 clue (from the token pool) for each Scientist asset at this location. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: θ If Ezra Graves is at this location, exhaust him and spend 1 clue: Defeat a non-Elite enemy in any era. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Thomas Corrigan: You get +2 ά for this skill test. ι When you initiate a skill test, exhaust Thomas Corrigan: If you succeed, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Mary Zielinski: You get +2 έ for this skill test. η Exhaust Mary Zielinski: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

property.name: Text
property.value: θ During any investigator's turn, exhaust Ezra Graves and spend 1 resource: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn. η: Choose an Ally asset in your discard pile and put it into play under your control. (Max once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set the Dimensional Beam Machine asset aside, out of play. Flip this story card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski are at Corrigan Industries: Put the set-aside Dimensional Beam Machine asset into play under your control (if you are eliminated, set it aside, out of play). η If "teleporation research has begun," and Thomas Corrigan, Mary Zielinski, and the Dimensional Beam Machine are at the Future Miskatonic University: Test έ (3). If you succeed, spend 2p1e clues, as a group (8p1e clues, as a group, instead if you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode) and announce "Thomas and Mary have made a historic discovery." η If "Thomas and Mary have made a historic discovery" and Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski are at the Future Arkham Advertiser: Announce "Thomas and Mary have won a Nobel Prize." Objective – If all 3 abilities on this story card have been triggered, add it to the victory display (place a resource token over each ability when it is triggered). Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on the Arkham Gazette or an Arkham Advertiser in any era, as a news paper. (Group limit twice per game.) θ Remove 1 newspaper from this location: Place 1p1e clues (from the token pool) on this location. Remove 1 α, β, γ, or δ token from the chaos bag for the remainder of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If Thomas Corrigan is at this location, exhaust him and spend 1p1e clues: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on O'Malley's Watch Shop, as time. (Group limit once per game.) η Remove 1 time from this location: Remove 1 doom from an agenda in any era. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Free[ Remove 1 shipment from this location: Gain 4 resources or 1 clue (from the token pool). θ Spend 3 resources or exhaust 2 Scientist assets at this location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on the Present River Docks, as a shipment. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η If Mary Zielinski is at this location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on the Past Miskatonic University, as a seed. (Group limit once per game.) θ: If "a tree seed has been planted:" Gain 1 clue (from the token pool) for each Scientist assets at this location. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Remove 1 time capsule from this location: Choose up to 4 cards in your discard pile and add them to your hand. ηη If "Thomas and Mary have married:" Their children inherit Corrigan Industries. Gain 10 resources. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Thomas Corrigan's location gets +1 ά. ι When you initiate a skill test, exhaust Thomas Corrigan: If you succeed, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Mary Zielinski's location gets +1 έ. η Exhaust Mary Zielinski: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (2 charges). θ During your turn, exhaust Dimensional Beam Machine and spend 1 charde: Move an investigator or a non-Elite enemy at your location to any reveal location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Follow the instructions for your relevant era(s), below. _____ Past: Set Thomas Corrigan aside, out of play; he has been abducted. Place Mary Zielinski at Arkham Gazette. Set the Edwin Bennet enemy aside, out of play. _____ Present and Future: Set Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski aside, out of play; they have been abducted. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, set the Edwin Bennet enemy aside, out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: ηη: Ready and move Edwin Bennet to your location (even if he is in another era). η If Edwin Bennet is at your location: Fight/Evade. Either attack or attempt to evade Edwin Bennet. If you succeed, spend X clues, as a group, where X is the global number of players. Then, place 1 resource on him, as a target. (Group limit once per round.) Objective – If Edwin Bennet has 3 targets on him and he is at Tindalos, the forces of Tindalos seize him. Remove Edwin Bennet from the game and add all copies of this story card in each era to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Follow the instructions for your relevant era(s), below. Then, flip this story card over. _____ Past: Place Thomas Corrigan at Childhood Home. Place Mary Zielinski at O'Malley's Watch Shop. Place the Edwin Bennet asset at Arkham Gazette with 12 clues on him, then remove 3p1e clues from him. _____ Present and Future: Set Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski aside, out of play; they have been abducted. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, set the Edwin Bennet asset aside, out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: ηη: Ready and move Edwin Bennet to your location (even if he is in another era). η If Edwin Bennet is at your location: Parley. Test ά (3) or έ (3). If you succeed, spend X clues, as a group, where X is the global number of players. Then, place 1 resource on him, as a redemption. Objective – If Edwin Bennet has 3 or more redemption on him and he is at any Miskatonic University with Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski, he is redeemed. Remove all redemption from him and flip him over. Add all copies of this story card in each era to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Follow the instructions for your relevant era(s), below. _____ Past: Set Mary Zielinski aside, out of play; she has been abducted. Place Thomas Corrigan at Childhood Home. If you are playing Epic Multiplayer Mode, set the Edwin Bennet enemy aside, out of play. _____ Present: Set Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski aside, out of play; they have been abducted. Spawn the Edwin Bennet enemy at Miskatonic Univerisity. _____ Future: Set Thomas Corrigan and Mary Zielinski aside, out of play; they have been abducted. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, set the Edwin Bennet enemy aside, out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: If Edwin Bennet is at your location and he is ready: Parley. Place 1 of your clues on him. You may test έ (4). If you succeed, place 1 more of your clues on him. If you fail, exhaust him. η: Ready and move Edwin Bennet to your location (even if he is in another era). Forced – At the end of the round: Remove 1 clue from Edwin Bennet (2 clues instead if you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode). If you cannot, place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance. Forced – When Edwin Bennet would be abducted: Remove all damage and horror from him and place 2 doom on the current agenda instead. Objective – If "Thomas and Mary have won a Nobel Prize" and there is no Plot story card in play in any era, add this story card to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Patrol (nearest location with a Scientist asset). Edwin Bennet cannot be damaged. Clues cannot be discovered from Edwin Bennet's location. Forced – At the end of the mythos phase: Deal 1 damage to a Scientist asset at Edwin Bennet's location.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ If it is your turn and you are at a Portal location, exhaust Edwin Bennet and spend 2 resources: Move to Tindalos.

property.name: Text
property.value: Patrol (nearest location with a Scientist asset). Edwin Bennet cannot be damaged. Clues cannot be discovered from Edwin Bennet's location. Forced – At the end of the mythos phase: Deal 1 damage to a Scientist asset at Edwin Bennet's location. Then, choose an investigator to draw the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After Edwin Bennet exhausts: Choose an investigator to draw the top card of the encounter deck. [Reaciton] When you draw an encounter card, exhaust Edwin Bennet: Cancel all of that card's effects and discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Place 1p1e horror on each Miskatonic University location, as anomalies. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, also place 1p1e horror on the following locations, as anomalies: Arkham Gazette, Arkham Advertiser, O'Malley's Watch Shop, and Tick-Tock Club. Remove the following enemies from the game: Tyr'thrha, Old Sadie Sheldon, and all 3 copies of Sheldon Gang. Flip this story card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abilities on locations with an anomaly cannot be triggered. η Spend any number of clues: Test ά (3) or ί (3). You get +3 skill value to this test for each clue spent this way. If you succeed, remove 1 anomaly from your location (2 anomalies instead if you succeed by 3 or more). Then, if you succeed by 4 or more and "Corrigan Industries has been founded," remove 1 anomaly from a location with the same title as your location, in any era. Objective – If it is agenda 2a and each location has no anomalies, add this story card to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set the Old Sadie Sheldon enemy and all 3 copies of the Sheldon Gang enemy aside, out of play. Remove the Tyr'thrha enemy from the game. You make a deal with Old Sadie Sheldon: each investigator playing the present era gains 2 resoures.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If "the debt has been paid," spend 1p1e clues, as a group: Search the play area, encounter deck, or encounter discard pile for a Sheldon Gang enemy and add it to the victory display. If you searched the encounter deck, shuffle it. This action does not cause attacks of opportunity. Objective – If all 3 Sheldon Gang enemies are in the victory display, add this story card to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Each Sheldon Gang enemy gets +1 fight and +1 evade. η: Parley. Test έ (2). If you succeed, spend 3p1e resources, as a group, to add Old Sadie Sholdon to the victory display and announce "the debt has been paid." Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Surge. Hunter. Massive. Sheldon Gang gets +2p1e health. Forced – After an investigator at Sheldon Gang's location plays a card: Ready Sheldon Gang and discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Put each Criminal enemy discarded this pay into play at that location. Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set the Tyr'thrha enemy aside, out of play. Remove the Old Sadie Sheldon enemy and all 3 copies of the Sheldon Gang enemy from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If Tyr'thrha is at your location, spend 1 clue: Test έ (3). If you succeed, deal 2 damage to Tyr'thrha (3 damage instead if you succeed by 3 or more). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Objective – If Tyr'thrha is defeated, add this story card to the victory display. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Massive. Retaliate. Patrol (nearest location with a Scientist asset). *Tyr'thrha has a global health pool of 6p1e. Forced – When Tyr'thrha enters a location: Each Scientist asst at that location is abducted. Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Patrol (nearest location with a Scientist asset). Ghastly Satyr gets +1 fight while it is at a Past location and +2 fight while it is at a Present location. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase, if Ghastly Satyr is ready: Deal 1 damage to each Scientist asset at its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Patrol (nearest location with a Scientist asset). Ghastly Satyr gets +1 health while it is at a Present location and +2 health while it is at a Future location. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase, if Hound of Tindalos is ready: Deal 1 horror to each Scientist asset at its location, and move each Scientist asset and investigator at its location to Tindalos.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Tindalos. Hunter. While Many-Angled Thing is at a... — ...Past location, it gets +1 evade and gains alert. — ...Present location, it gets +1 damage and + 1 horror. — ...Future location, it gets +1 fight and gains retaliate. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Alert. Retaliate. Forced – After Tindalos Alpha attacks you: Shuffle a non-story asset you control into your deck, moving all damage and horror from that asset to your investigator. Discard Tindalos Alpha. Forced – At the end of the enemy phase: Discard Tindalos Alpha.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (3). For each point you fail by, you must either lose 1 action or take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – If there are no Ally assets at your location, Abducted gains surge. Otherwise, test ά (5). If you fail, exhaust all Ally asset at your location and deal 5 horror to one of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If you are at a... — ...Past location, lose 3 resources. — ...Present location, place 2 of your clues on it. — ...Future location, lose 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach to the nearest Portal location. Place 1 doom on Dimensional Breach. Each enemy at attached location gets +1 fight, +1 evade, and +1 health. [Aciton]: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Dimensional Breach.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ί (4). If you fail and you are at a... — ...Past location, exhaust all assets at it. — ...Present location, take 1 direct damage. Deal 1 damage to each Ally asset at your location. — ...Future location, take 1 direct horror. Deal 1 horror to each Ally asset at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Shuffle a non-story asset you control into your deck, moving all damage and horror from that asset to your investigator. If no asset is shuffle into your deck by this deck, choose and discard 3 cards from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each card in your hand that matches one of the discarded cards (by title), discard that card from your hand and lose 1 action. Shuffle each weakness discarded by this effect into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Take 1 damage. Test ί (3). If you fail, take 1 additional damage and move to Tindalos.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach to the current agenda. Abilities on story cards cannot be triggered. η: If you are at a Past location, you may test ά (2). If you are at a Present location, you may test ί (3). If you are at a Future location, you may test ή (4). If you succeed at 1 or more of these test, discard Temporal Distortion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – You must decide (choose one): — Discard a non-story Item asset you control. — Choose and discard 3 non-weakness cards from your hand.
